title: Yummy Candy Factory
description: Yummy Candy Factory is a cute arcade game where you make candies! Purple, red, green, and yellow! The candy comes in many different colors and flavors. Now you have a whole candy factory to make candies in your style! You have a few steps to make your awesome candies. Choose flavors such as strawberry, grapes, apple, and pineapple. Mix and boil the ingredients. Shape all of the sweets and decorate them! Let's learn how to make yummy candies together!
